reactor.test

类 MemoryUtils.OffHeapDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.test.MemoryUtils.OffHeapDetector
  • 封闭类:
    MemoryUtils

    public static final class MemoryUtils.OffHeapDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class to check that some MemoryUtils.Tracked objects (emulating off heap objects) are explicitly released.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      OffHeapDetector() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void assertNoLeaks()
      Assert that all currently tracked objects have been released.
      void reset()
      Reset this tracker, clearing the queue of tracked objects (which can be useful eg. when looping multiple times in order to test race conditions).
      MemoryUtils.Tracked track(int identifier)
      Create a MemoryUtils.Tracked object from an int id, for convenience.
      MemoryUtils.Tracked track(java.lang.String identifier)
      Create a MemoryUtils.Tracked object with the given String identifier.
      long trackedTotal()
      Return the total number of tracked objects so far.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public OffHeapDetector()

    • 方法详细资料

      • track

        public final MemoryUtils.Tracked track(java.lang.String identifier)
        Create a MemoryUtils.Tracked object with the given String identifier.
        参数:
        identifier - the identifier for the tracked object
        返回:
        the new tracked object to be manually released

      • track

        public final MemoryUtils.Tracked track(int identifier)
        Create a MemoryUtils.Tracked object from an int id, for convenience.
        参数:
        identifier - the identifier for the tracked object
        返回:
        the new tracked object to be manually released

      • trackedTotal

        public final long trackedTotal()
        Return the total number of tracked objects so far.
        返回:
        the number of tracked objects

      • assertNoLeaks

        public void assertNoLeaks()
        Assert that all currently tracked objects have been released.

        Note that the MemoryUtils.Tracked object has a custom AssertJ representation (otherwise it would be represented as an AtomicBoolean). It is automatically registered in AssertionsUtils whenever an MemoryUtils.OffHeapDetector is instantiated.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset this tracker, clearing the queue of tracked objects (which can be useful eg. when looping multiple times in order to test race conditions).
